appName.message: Yooz - ChatGPT Copilot, Free AI Assistant

appDesc.message: Use ChatGPT while browsing the web

selectionPromptLabel.message: Ask ChatGPT to explain, translate, edit..

writingPromptLabel.message: What do you want to write

reviewCodePrompt.message: Review the commit for errors and potential improvements

loginMessage.message: Please login and pass Cloudflare check at

loginMessageDesc.message: OpenAI requires passing a security check every once in a while. If this keeps happening, change AI provider to OpenAI API in the extension options.

ratingMessage.message: Enjoy this extension? Give us a 5-star rating at

optProviderChatGPTDesc.message: The API that powers ChatGPT webapp, free, but sometimes unstable

optProviderChatGPT4Desc.message: The GPT-4 model is only available for Plus users and has a very limited quota. Do not select this if you're concerned about the quota limit.

optProviderOpenAIDesc.message: OpenAI official API, more stable, charge by usage

optProviderOpenAIKeyTip.message: You can find or create your API key here

optSRDesc.message: Available only in Linkedin, Gmail, Outlook and Slack (we will add more websites soon)

optAutoDelete.message: Auto delete ChatGPT conversations after generation
